[vc_row row_height_percent=”0″ override_padding=”yes” h_padding=”2″ top_padding=”5″ bottom_padding=”2″ back_color=”color-160695″ overlay_alpha=”25″ gutter_size=”3″ column_width_percent=”100″ shift_y=”0″ z_index=”0″ shape_dividers=”” el_class=”am-pr-2020″][vc_column column_width_percent=”100″ position_vertical=”middle” align_horizontal=”align_center” gutter_size=”3″ overlay_alpha=”50″ shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ shift_y_down=”0″ z_index=”0″ medium_width=”0″ mobile_width=”0″ width=”1/1″][vc_custom_heading heading_semantic=”h3″ text_size=”h3″ text_color=”color-xsdn”]Audible Magic Acquires MediaNet’s Business from SOCAN! Learn more.[/vc_custom_heading][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_height_percent=”0″ override_padding=”yes” h_padding=”2″ top_padding=”6″ bottom_padding=”7″ back_color=”color-xsdn” back_image=”6320″ back_repeat=”no-repeat” back_attachment=”scroll” back_position=”center center” overlay_alpha=”50″ gutter_size=”3″ column_width_percent=”100″ shift_y=”0″ z_index=”0″ css=”.vc_custom_1605922969309{padding-top: 100px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;}” el_class=”home-hero-section”][vc_column column_width_percent=”100″ position_vertical=”bottom” align_horizontal=”align_center” gutter_size=”0″ overlay_alpha=”50″ shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ shift_y_down=”0″ z_index=”0″ medium_width=”0″ mobile_width=”0″ width=”1/1″][vc_custom_heading heading_semantic=”h1″ text_size=”h1″ text_color=”color-xsdn” el_class=”home-hero-title”]Come together[/vc_custom_heading][vc_column_text el_class=”home-hero-subtext”]

Leaders in online streaming of media and entertainment trust Audible Magic to identify content, manage rights, and monetize media. It’s a powerful combination.

[/vc_column_text][vc_button button_color=”color-xsdn” radius=”btn-circle” border_width=”0″ link=”url:%2Farticle-17%2F|title:Article%2017||” el_class=”home-hero-btn”]Prepare for Article 17[/vc_button][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row unlock_row_content=”yes” row_height_percent=”0″ override_padding=”yes” h_padding=”2″ top_padding=”0″ bottom_padding=”0″ overlay_alpha=”80″ gutter_size=”3″ column_width_percent=”100″ shift_y=”0″ z_index=”0″ css=”.vc_custom_1566341874946{margin-top: -120px !important;padding-top: 14px !important;padding-bottom: 14px !important;}” el_class=”home-hero-partners”][vc_column width=”1/1″][vc_gallery el_id=”gallery-551335″ type=”carousel” medias=”4997,5000,4999,5002,5003,4996,5005,5383,4998,5001″ carousel_lg=”10″ carousel_md=”10″ carousel_sm=”10″ gutter_size=”0″ media_items=”media|nolink|original” carousel_interval=”3000″ carousel_navspeed=”400″ stage_padding=”0″ single_overlay_opacity=”50″ single_padding=”0″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_height_percent=”0″ override_padding=”yes” h_padding=”2″ top_padding=”5″ bottom_padding=”5″ back_color=”color-144234″ overlay_alpha=”50″ gutter_size=”3″ column_width_percent=”100″ shift_y=”0″ z_index=”0″][vc_column width=”1/1″][vc_row_inner row_inner_height_percent=”0″ overlay_alpha=”50″ gutter_size=”3″ shift_y=”0″ z_index=”0″][vc_column_inner column_width_percent=”100″ position_vertical=”middle” align_horizontal=”align_center” gutter_size=”3″ override_padding=”yes” column_padding=”0″ overlay_alpha=”50″ shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ shift_y_down=”0″ z_index=”0″ medium_width=”0″ mobile_width=”0″ width=”1/1″][vc_custom_heading text_size=”h1″]Automatic content recognition?
More like automatic content monetization.[/vc_custom_heading][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner row_inner_height_percent=”0″ overlay_alpha=”50″ gutter_size=”3″ shift_y=”0″ z_index=”0″ css=”.vc_custom_1566281970440{margin-bottom: 80px !important;}”][vc_column_inner column_width_percent=”100″ gutter_size=”3″ overlay_alpha=”50″ shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ shift_y_down=”0″ z_index=”0″ medium_width=”0″ mobile_width=”0″ width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]Audible Magic is the trusted intermediary between rights holders (including labels, studios, distributors, publishers and collectives) and social media platforms (including Facebook, Soundcloud, Dailymotion and Twitch).[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner column_width_percent=”100″ gutter_size=”3″ overlay_alpha=”50″ shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ shift_y_down=”0″ z_index=”0″ medium_width=”0″ mobile_width=”0″ width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]For 20 years, industry veterans and fast-growing startups have trusted Audible Magic to offer solutions that not only enable their businesses to exist but to grow and flourish. We enable the digital media ecosystem. See all we can do for you.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner row_inner_height_percent=”0″ overlay_alpha=”50″ gutter_size=”3″ shift_y=”0″ z_index=”0″ [/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner row_inner_height_percent=”0″ overlay_alpha=”50″ equal_height=”yes” gutter_size=”3″ shift_y=”0″ z_index=”0″][vc_column_inner column_width_percent=”100″ gutter_size=”2″ back_color=”color-xsdn” overlay_alpha=”50″ shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ shift_y_down=”0″ z_index=”0″ medium_width=”0″ mobile_width=”0″ radius=”std” shadow=”xs” width=”1/3″ link_to=”url:%2Fsolutions%2F%23rights|||” el_class=”solution-box”][vc_custom_heading text_size=”h4″]Rights, respected.[/vc_custom_heading][vc_column_text]We streamline the use of content identification to protect and ensure legitimate usage of music, movie, and television content online. We deliver solutions that simplify assessment of authorized or unauthorized uses of media, facilitate content licensing, and meet legal obligations.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner column_width_percent=”100″ gutter_size=”2″ back_color=”color-xsdn” overlay_alpha=”50″ shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ shift_y_down=”0″ z_index=”0″ medium_width=”0″ mobile_width=”0″ radius=”std” shadow=”xs” width=”1/3″ link_to=”url:%2Fsolutions%2F%23monetization|||” el_class=”solution-box”][vc_custom_heading text_size=”h4″]Monetization, managed.[/vc_custom_heading][vc_column_text]We enable social media platforms to license use of copyright media in user-generated content (UGC) efficiently and effectively.

Our services reduce the cost of enabling UGC for monetization.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner column_width_percent=”100″ gutter_size=”2″ back_color=”color-xsdn” overlay_alpha=”50″ shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ shift_y_down=”0″ z_index=”0″ medium_width=”0″ mobile_width=”0″ radius=”std” shadow=”xs” width=”1/3″ link_to=”url:%2Fsolutions%2F%23royalties|||” el_class=”solution-box”][vc_custom_heading text_size=”h4″]Royalties, paid.[/vc_custom_heading][vc_column_text]We assist platforms to accurately payout royalties. This minimizes the need to build back-office rights-management systems, to allocate human capital to manage rights, and to coordinate with thousands of rights holders globally to clear content.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_height_percent=”0″ override_padding=”yes” h_padding=”2″ top_padding=”2″ bottom_padding=”0″ overlay_alpha=”50″ equal_height=”yes” gutter_size=”3″ column_width_percent=”100″ shift_y=”0″ z_index=”0″][vc_column column_width_percent=”100″ position_vertical=”middle” gutter_size=”2″ overlay_alpha=”50″ shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ shift_y_down=”0″ z_index=”0″ medium_width=”0″ mobile_width=”0″ width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading]Automated content recognition to make anyone stand up and cheer.[/vc_custom_heading][vc_column_text]Audible Magic’s Emmy-winning automatic content recognition (ACR) solutions power billions of nearly instantaneous content match transactions every month, streamlining distribution and monetization. Even better, Audible Magic’s content protection (in the form of our content identification solution) enables businesses to thrive and — perhaps, one day — win a few awards of their own.[/vc_column_text][vc_button button_color=”color-189483″ border_width=”0″ link=”url:%2Ftechnology%2F|||”]See how this works[/vc_button][/vc_column][vc_column column_width_percent=”100″ <title>Audible Magic - Automatic Content Recognition, Content Identification (ID) and Rights Administration</title>
<meta name="description" content="Audible Magic offers the leading Automatic Content Recognition technology and Rights Management Systems for companies such as Facebook, Twitch, Soundcloud, Dailmotion and many others." />
